column1: Good day, esteemed dragon and shark!
column2: Please, allow us to introduce ourselves and present our excellent idea
column3: I come in the name of the highly respected Magicians and Alchemists guild.
column4: We have stumbled upon a way to turn lead into gold, so we came seeking an investment We want to refine our formula so we can comercialize it. Of course, such a discovery will only be accessible to the most exclusive people! We now need an investment to continue with our investigations.
column5: We'd need 1,000 gold coins to do the final product and release it to the public

column2: Let me tell you who we are
column3: My son and I are the best fishermen in the zone! I fish the biggest, the tastiest fishes!
column4: And now? Now we discovered an even BIGGER and TASTIER fish! But it is complicated to fish. we need a special rode and the fucker broke the last one, a bigger boat, men to help me. Will ya' help us, mate?
column5: We need 700 golds! Let the people taste that fucking damn delicatessen!

column3: We are the Pure Flame Church.
column4: We want to start doing theatre plays to entertain and teach our devotes. We need to build a stage on one of our churches, and get the needed equipment to be able to have good plays, and not just people reading a text.
column5: Dragon, shark, we request 400 gold coins to be able to start the plays.

column2: You should already know who we are but I'll remind you.
column3: We are the army of the Lotus Reign, the biggest and most powerful one in here
column4: We need to investigate more ways of winning wars. We discovered a new substance to use in our wars. It's so flammable that it burns even inside the water
column5: We'd need 1,200 coins to perfect its formula, and it'd be such an immense advantadge that it would make us even greater than we are!

column3: We are a simple leatherworker family. My granfather's grandfather founded it, and now we're going through a bit of a rough patch.
column4: However, we discovered a new way to treat leather, so it will be easier and faster, and less damaging for the product. Now we can make a chest armor in less than a week, when before at best we'd take two weeks to do it.
column5: We need around 800 coins to get more equipment, materials and people. Thank you!

column1: Oi, mate! Thank you for letting us in!
column2: I'll tell you who we are.
column3: We're the oldest and best beer producers in all of the zone. Our beer is drank by all of the kings in here
column4: And now we can do more beer, and not only more... but better! We are faster and better at it, even better than my granfather, the most famous beer-maker EVER on this place.
column5: We need like 500 coins to buy some equipment and we'll be all set.

column1: May you have good day, dear dragon and shark.
column2: Please, allow me to introduce my collective.
column3: We are scientists that want to better this world. We don't want to be rich, just to advance our society.
column4: We found a way to cure the Black Plague. However it's still pretty primitive, so it needs a lot more refinement.
column5: Thank you for listening to me. I hope you'll help. We need 1,000 gold coins to do it all well. I promise this is in benefit of the people

column1: You'll listen and say 'yes' because we just deserve it
column2: You know who we are, right? Well, let me tell you, just in case you forgot.
column3: We are the best adventurers on this world.
column4: We were, in fact, thinking of going adventuring and all this... However we don't have our weapons. Eh... that's embarrassing, we didn't lose them! What do you mean your brother? Well... this. We need equipment and you better help us buy it
column5: We need just 1,500 gold. It was all expensive! Told you we're the best, right?

column1: Hello. I hope you're able to help us.
column2: Please, let us introduce ourselves and our business.
column3: We are a family of traditional shoemakers.
column4: We'd like to make better shoes, and to make them faster. I can't help but lament when all these cheap shoemakers charge for those crappy shoes, made with crappy materials. So please, help us to be able to sell our good shoes to everyone.
column5: We'll need 750 coins to get good leather and equipment.

column1: Thank you for letting me come here to talk to you, o dragon and shark!
column2: Please let me introduce myself and my family
column3: We are just humble farmers that want to grow more crops.
column4: There's an empty plot of land next to ours, and we'd like to buy it. However, at the start of the season we spent all of our savings on the crops and a bull. We'd need a bit more money to buy that land.
column5: We just need 200 gold coins, it's what they ask for it. If you could help us, please.
